title: Forge Window Overrides
description: Configuration for window-specific tiling behavior in Forge GNOME extension

wmClass.description: Window class to match. Use 'xprop WM_CLASS' or GNOME Looking Glass to find. Supports substring matching.

wmTitle.description: Window title to match (optional). Supports: substring matching, '!' prefix for negation, comma-separated values for multiple patterns.

wmId.description: Specific window ID (runtime use only, added by keyboard shortcut - not for manual configuration)

mode.description: float = window will not be tiled (stays floating), tile = force window to tile even if it would normally float
